case.name: People Telecom Limited, in the matter of People Telecom Limited [2009] FCA 180 (25 February 2009)

citation.tocase: Re APN News & Media Ltd [2007] FCA 770 ; (2007) 62 ACSR 400
citation.text: The details of the break fee are addressed in the affidavit of Mr Barry John Hamilton, who is the non-executive Chairman of People. Importantly, the break fee is not payable if the proposed scheme is not approved by the shareholders, thus it cannot be said to be a matter which could influence voting at the scheme meeting: see Re SFE Corporation Limited [2006] FCA 670 per Gyles J at [6] to [7]; see also Re APN News & Media Ltd [2007] FCA 770 ; (2007) 62 ACSR 400 at [43] .

The details of the break fee are addressed in the affidavit of Mr Barry John Hamilton, who is the non-executive Chairman of People. Importantly, the break fee is not payable if the proposed scheme is not approved by the shareholders, thus it cannot be said to be a matter which could influence voting at the scheme meeting: see Re SFE Corporation Limited [2006] FCA 670 per Gyles J at [6] to [7]; see also Re APN News & Media Ltd [2007] FCA 770 ; (2007) 62 ACSR 400 at [43] .
